title: You run into your main at Walmart....
body:
What is in their cart?

{{champion:80}}  - Baking Supplies

replies.body: {{champion:412}} It's empty because Wal Mart already took the souls of their employees.
Don't forget their customers!

{{champion:86}} Getting the newest beyblades

{{champion:41}} {{champion:16}} Just argue in the produce section over who's fruit is better

{{champion:45}} Blocks the entire isle with his cart. Truly evil

{{champion:201}} Poro food

{{champion:103}} 10 different bottles of conditioner for her head and each tail

{{champion:83}} Shovel repair

{{champion:157}} A new air conditioner

{{champion:245}} Buys a candy bar, goes back in time right after he gets his receipt, shows it as proof of purchase, keeps his money

{{champion:99}} {{champion:89}} Light bulbs

{{champion:131}} A baseball bat to smash their lightbulbs

{{champion:22}} The box of ice outside. The entire damn box

{{champion:268}} Actually works there as a manager "Yeah, restock the Cheerios on isle 5. THE ORDER IS GIVEN!"

{{champion:92}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:13}} New keyboards

{{champion:80}} A CD of "It's rainin' men"

{{champion:75}} Anything that he can stack

{{champion:79}} Purple beer

{{champion:38}} A rework

{{champion:30}} "I just need the "R" key, can't I just buy that?"

{{champion:63}} Dura-Flame logs

{{champion:31}} ALL the meat

{{champion:32}} Works as the janitor. They never have to pay for mop water!

{{champion:161}} Staring contest magazines. Why do all the employees look soul-less?

{{champion:72}} Nothing, but floating crystals are in the store.

{{champion:60}} Nature DvD's about spiders. Employees are also missing. 

{{champion:429}} She would turn annoying people into mist and suck them into her chest. She also got the latest issue of Spear Throwing 101.
Only scrubs read Spear Throwing. True connoisseurs of the art read "Javeliniers weekly"
Only connoisseurs read Javeliniers weekly. Grand Masters read "The Style of Javenlinia". Only the finest of Javelining information is printed on this high quality magazine series.

{{champion:44}} : Gems ar...
Me: You know those are fake right?
{{champion:44}} : This is outrageous! Truly, truly outrageous!

Bathroom cleaning supplies.

{{champion:86}}  - "Villainous scum!"

That bathroon product better have a good Garentee.....

I couldn't resist.. :(
{{champion:131}}  Sun Block
{{champion:236}} An obnoxious amount of nerf guns.
How many is deemed "Obnoxious"?
All of them.

My last comment was troll... this is the real one


{{champion:33}}  Dictionary
{{champion:114}} Nothing, because she wouldn't be caught dead in peasant infested Wal-Mart

{{champion:55}}  *stuffed animal in her cart*
me: "uhhh"
{{champion:55}} *readies daggers*
me: "OH SHI-"

{{champion:77}} 

Steak, cat nip, fire extinguisher, and turtle wax.
Don't you mean turtle wax?

+1 I KNOW THE REFERENCE.

{{champion:27}}: Sixth grade chemistry set, a bag of Balloons, and lots of glass containers
Me: (Suspiciously) What are you going to do with that...?
{{champion:27}}: ...Chemistry (Shows with his hands)
Me: Ok... (Leaves without telling anyone)
_Later that day_
{{champion:40}}: Toxic Chemicals were literally raining from the sky earlier this morning as notorious master chemist {{champion:27}} has used a sixth grade chemistry set to make the chemical and use balloons and glass containers, to get them up in the air, we go to Officer {{champion:51}} on the case right.
{{champion:51}}: We have found Singed and are currently in hot pursuit of him
{{champion:40}}: How long did it take to find him?
{{champion:51}}: (Nervously) oooooooh, only a few minutes
{{champion:40}}: But did you not start the search 3 hours ago?
{{champion:51}}: (Sighing): Yes, we did
{{champion:40}}: Then what is wrong with the current chase
{{champion:51}}: (Annoyed) Everything
{{champion:106}}: Don't worry (Coughs) We almost got him
{{champion:48}}: Yah, he can't-
({{champion:27}} throws down another adhesive)
{{champion:48}}: NOOOOOOOOOO! (Throws down a giant traffic cone)
{{champion:27}}: {{summoner:4}} 
{{champion:40}}: Well this is one slippery fiend we have, how long do you think this will take?
{{champion:51}}: We don't know, he's made a lot of home made {{item:2004}} so it could last for weeks. (Turning to Captain {{champion:106}}) Which we could have avoided if you just listened to my plan!
{{champion:106}}: Now listen hear, I said to get Garen,but you went-!
{{champion:40}}: Will the villain {{champion:27}} be caught, we'll have more on this story tonight at 10.
http://i.imgur.com/BuLq3Qk.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/gdAqzdU.gif

{{champion:112}} Multiple toolkits, various electronics, automotive supplies.  Overheard lecturing the guy in the electronics department about how Deus Ex Human Revolution was an excellent game.
{{champion:122}} Sports drinks, basketball jersey, basketball, three boxes of new shoes.  The basketball is suspiciously bloody.
{{champion:51}}  Ammunition, netting, sixteen boxes of cupcakes.  Occasionally spotted dropping cupcakes in the aisles and waiting for small children to take them.
{{champion:25}} Cosmetics and makeup, baking supplies, mid-range webcam.  Overheard complaining about how more people should be reading her blog.
{{champion:10}} Groceries, cleaning supplies, metal polish, well-hidden copy of GTA V.  Claimed the latter was to better understand the minds of evildoers.
{{champion:113}} 75 pounds of bacon, 20 gallons of pet shampoo, pressure washer.  Paged over the intercom because her boar was destroying cars in the parking lot.  Took her cart and went out to calm him down.  Nobody noticed she didn't pay for anything.

{{champion:62}} Far too many bananas
{{champion:90}} Liter boxes for his voidlings.
{{champion:106}} an unbearable amount of batteries
{{champion:91}} Actual groceries since he's probably the only sane person in all of League.
{{champion:6}} The latest makeup
{{champion:23}} Lube and dirty magazines.
Why would he need magazines when he has{{champion:22}}
his right arm is still a lot stronger than his left arm.
{{champion:103}} *censored*

{{champion:223}}  Everything
{{champion:201}} Convinced to pay for Tahm's cart
{{champion:412}} 100Watt Lightbulbs in hope that his team will finally see his lantern.
{{champion:10}} Kale, of course. Nowaitstopdonthitme!
{{champion:45}} - things found only on the bottom shelf

{{champion:131}} 
So. Many. Moon. Pies.

{{champion:41}} *Cart full of oranges*

Me: "How are you going to pay for - "

{{champion:41}} "Eat one and go about your day as normal."

*I actually main ekko... but I can't think of any scenarios for him.*
{{champion:102}} - completely full of jerky. She's also opened a package and is munching on some as I talk to her.
She better pay for that.
I hope so, cause I don't want to pay for it. A single back of Jack Links costs 4.98 these days!
Where do you live? Jerky everywhere else is like $6 for 4 strips.... Why must you be so expensive my jerky of beef?!?!?

{{champion:29}} all the food that is on promotion... for reaching expiration date...

{{champion:26}} Clocks
